articles.description: Lenovo has launched the Yoga AIO 7 desktop PC at CES 2021. The Yoga AIO 7, also known as Yoga 27 in China, is powered by AMD Renoir 4000 H-series APUs and the NVIDIA RTX 2060 GPU. The Yoga AIO 7 comes with built-in casting hardware and a future update will en…
articles.content: Lenovo has announced the Yoga all-in-one (AIO) 7 PC built for both work and play. Featuring a hinge that can be rotated effortlessly with just a push of the finger, the Lenovo Yoga AIO 7 is designed … [+1263 chars]
